long_description: Sized for 30 lbs. of adventure gear, the lightweight Gregory Z30 Pack uses advanced suspension for a perfect fit and mesh straps to help keep you cool during warm hikes. Flexible Auto-Fit harness conforms to your shoulders' angles; perforated foam shoulder straps with 3D mesh surfaces wick away moisture. CrossFlo(TM) DTS suspension provides cooling airflow across your back and efficiently transfers load weight to your hips. Internal sleeve accommodates a hydration reservoir (not included); dual exit ports allow the drinking tube to be routed on either side of the pack. Front bucket pocket offers a great place to stash and access bulky gear. Quick-access hipbelt pockets are ideal for stashing gels, lip balm, sunscreen, multitools or small electronics. Side and bottom compression straps let you cinch down loads for jostle-free carrying and double as lash points for bulky gear. The Gregory Z30 Pack is made of 210-denier double diamond ripstop nylon and 330-denier oxford flat weave nylon fabrics that resist tears and abrasion. Zippered top and front pockets; side stretch pockets; dual ice axe attachments. Closeout.
short_description: Sized for 30 lbs. of adventure gear, the lightweight Gregory Z30 Pack uses advanced suspension for a perfect fit and mesh straps to help keep you cool during warm hikes.
